title: Got a warning.
body:
ahahhaha got a warning for raging out on a bot in custum game :D ... Big Brother is watching :D

Edit: Was only me and the bot.

replies.body: Well, while typically the bot doesn't care what you say, you have to be mindful of the other players; even though it isn't directed at them they may not appreciate it. You only get that warning when you've had a spike in reports against you, so it's likely not just that one match where you've been getting reports. If you've not actually done anything wrong the reports won't hurt you, though.
The warning came from a previous game then.

repro steps

1) play a game with you
2) idle in the post game screen
3) AFK
4) you go start your bot game
5) Return from AFK
6) RAPOOOOORRRRTTT ME TEAM MATEEEEE (or enemy)
7) you finish your bot game
8) viola, you now have a delayed notification !!

it works with honors as well, so you can make it look like that a bot gave you an "honorable opponent" notification !
That bot you were playing with turns out to be this AI, it goes by the name Yui, dad is kirito and mom is asuna.
Annnnnnnnnd up vote for Sao reference
What do you mean you got a warning in a custom game?
10-15 min after the custom game a message poped that says  WARNING : duo to a negative activite or something like that.

> [{quoted}](name=Dan4o88PancheF,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jRsF7bHL,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-03-03T01:51:35.011+0000)
>
> 10-15 min after the custom game a message poped that says  WARNING : duo to a negative activite or something like that.

Was this what you saw?

http://i.imgur.com/3iOLfjL.png

That is actually for when a past report you made resulted in a punishment being issued.
that happens all the time when you get reported more often than usual. doesnt say that you did something wrong, just that ppl reported you.
Couldn't have been one of the other four people in the game...

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=jRsF7bHL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-03T01:37:29.323+0000)
>
> Couldn't have been one of the other four people in the game...

me and a bot :) , i guess he reported me :D
Or you got into your custom game before the player from the previous game reported you.

Bots have feelings too

But seriously, just because you got the warning after a bot game doesn't mean you were punished for THAT game.  Chances are you were punished for earlier games.  Care to post your reform card?

wait... if you were raging (with just the AI bot as company I'm assuming) & the system picked up on whatever you said to that poor little AI...You monster!!

You'd have done better kicking a washing machine and calling it nasty things.

The AI fights back & the system retaliates. 

A washing machine will not.
Calmly the correct word at all.
